problem.markdown:
The Acme Tools Company uses a lathe to machine an aluminum block. The operation time is 5 minutes.
On average, the lathe requires maintenance after 200 parts. The average maintenance time is about 2 hours. (For the purpose of these calculations, maintenance is the same as failure.
>>What is the production rate of the machine in parts per minute? (Round to 3 decimal places) <<
= 0.179 +-0.018

numericalresponse.p: The Acme Tools Company uses a lathe to machine an aluminum block. The operation time is 5 minutes.
On average, the lathe requires maintenance after 200 parts. The average maintenance time is about 2 hours. (For the purpose of these calculations, maintenance is the same as failure.
numericalresponse.label: What is the production rate of the machine in parts per minute? (Round to 3 decimal places)
